welcome:
Welcome to our Loan Calculator!
We are going to see if borrowing money is the right move for you to make at this time.
Remember were on your side.
Lets get into it!
ask_for_loan_amount: How much would you like to borrow?
ask_for_APR: What is your Annual Percentage Rate (APR)?
ask_for_loan_duration: How many years is your Loan Term for?
monthly_payment: Your estimated Monthly Payment would be about $
